subject: Road house in Atlanta=Ursula?
author: Country
full_text:
Greetings Ursula:
How did the SB7 work for you at the road house in Atlanta?
Thanks much,
CB

> >
> > I haven't used the sb7 yet..I'm going to the road house in atlanta,iN on the 18 can't wait to see how it stand up to the boxes...its a overnight thing so I plan to use a few different devices. I thought they had some interested hits on it.
>
